projects.title: Nematron-AI
projects.description: Enterprise-grade AI chatbot system developed through Metropolia University's Minno¬Æ innovation program. Features local AI inference capabilities, intelligent web scraping, and advanced search integration designed to address real-world client requirements.
projects.role: Backend engineer specializing in data integration services, including web scraping architecture, DuckDuckGo search API implementation, content summarization algorithms, and real-time messaging infrastructure for seamless frontend communication.
projects.notes: Collaborative academic-industry project developed under strict confidentiality agreements with external clients.

projects.title: Neural Networking
projects.description: Comprehensive machine learning portfolio demonstrating advanced neural network implementations across diverse problem domains including computer vision and medical image analysis.

projects.title: Project 1 - Dogs vs Cats
projects.role: Primary developer responsible for complete implementation of convolutional neural network architecture, data preprocessing pipelines, model training procedures, and comprehensive project documentation.

projects.title: Project 3 - Pneumonia Detection
projects.role: Sole contributor responsible for developing medical image classification model, implementing deep learning architecture for X-ray analysis, and creating detailed technical documentation for clinical applications.

projects.title: MetPoll
projects.description: Real-time feedback collection platform enabling educators to monitor lecture effectiveness and student engagement through live polling and analytics dashboards.
projects.role: Lead backend developer responsible for designing and implementing RESTful API architecture, database integration, frontend-backend communication protocols, and comprehensive API testing procedures.

projects.title: StackConnect
projects.description: Professional networking platform tailored for software developers, featuring job matching algorithms, portfolio showcase capabilities, and integrated communication tools built on modern web technologies.
projects.role: Backend architect responsible for server-side development using Node.js and Express, user authentication and authorization systems, comprehensive API documentation, and cloud deployment infrastructure management.

projects.title: FlightStation Simulator
projects.description: Comprehensive airport operations simulation application modeling passenger flow dynamics, service point optimization, and resource allocation scenarios using discrete event simulation principles.
projects.role: Frontend developer and system architect responsible for user interface design using JavaFX, codebase internationalization from Finnish to English, core simulation logic implementation, and comprehensive technical documentation.

projects.title: CryptBorn
projects.description: A top-down pixel-art dungeon crawler game featuring procedurally generated levels, real-time combat mechanics, and dynamic loot systems. Built from the ground up using Godot engine with custom gameplay mechanics.
projects.role: Solo developer, responsible for core game systems including procedural level generation algorithms, enemy AI behavior trees, combat mechanics, inventory management, and item progression systems.
projects.notes: Independent project that originated from a Godot Game Development course at Metropolia University of Applied Sciences. Currently in alpha stage, with plans for a complete rewrite from the ground up to enhance core systems and expand gameplay features.
